data.text:
The Iftar at the Ritz Carlton DIFC, turned out to be my favourite in Dubai so far. 
The elegance and brightness of the of the puritan white decoration is just stunningly gorgeous. And as can be expected from the Ritz Carlton, the standard of service is unsurpassed anywhere. 
The set up is laid out extremely well with an endless range and variety of dishes and it is designed so that there is no crowding despite the high popularity of the Iftar. There are several cold stations, hot stations and a plenty of delicious sweets. The Chefs at the Ritz Carlton are clearly excellent and there is no dish that is disappointing. 
If you want to please your family and friends, book them for a lovely Iftar at the Ritz.
data.title: A Thoroughly Enjoyable Iftar

data.text: The Iftar buffet at The Ritz Carlton exceeded expectations, offering a memorable dining experience characterized by warm hospitality and impeccable service. The diverse selection of dishes, crafted by the talented culinary team, showcased authentic flavors and high-quality ingredients.
data.title: Iftar buffet

data.text: Stayed here on business for a day, then came back a few days later for almost a week.  Typical Ritz Carlton - some good and some bad. Good customer service.  Nice lounge but it was overcrowded every night. It is somewhat small and often there was no place to sit. The driveway/drop off infrastructure is terrible. Always takes a while to drive in due to traffic and it’s a chaotic mess when you finally get in.  The guys working the valet are great, very friendly but the situation they have to work in is crazy. The rooms are nice, clean and modern.  The laundry and housekeeping staff were friendly and attentive. The breakfast is excellent with lots of selection. This is the first Marriott brand hotel I’ve stayed at that didn’t credit my Bonvoy points/night stay in a day or so after checking out.  It’s been over a week and even after several emails to the guest relations team and the front desk manager, still nothing. Looks like I’ll need to call the titanium elite Bonvoy service line to file a complaint to get the points/nights credited.  Shouldn’t be this hard - very disappointing.
data.title: Nice hotel with a few challenges

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear TravelingFamilyinSIN,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your experience here at The Ritz-Carlton, Dubai International Financial Centre .

We sincerely thank you for your constructive feedback and apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us; this is definitely not our usual practice. 

We have looked into the matters you have highlighted in detail and have taken necessary measures to ensure the level of service meets the highest standard. 

We hope to welcome you back again soon to provide you with an exceptional experience.

With best regards,

Christian El Khoury
General Manager
owner_response.author: Christian El Khoury

data.text:
Amazing breakfast!
We visited Cara for breakfast last week - wow what a beautiful place, incredible service and amazing food! No expense spared for amazing quality! We paid around 76 euros for 2 for breakfast - fantastic value! The eggs Benedict were cooked to perfection, the fresh juices so great and the bakery delicious!
data.title: Fantastic place for breakfast!

data.text:
Best experience every time I stay there, the full team make sure you feel like it’s home away from home. Abdulrazak, Zein and Nizam are always welcoming me upon my arrival with the biggest smile and warmest welcome, they know my preferred room and always try to give me my preferred rooms, prepare it ahead of time with a beautiful welcome gift & message, Gerard head of front desk took amazing care of me when I wanted to extend and it was fully booked, he made it happen and even got me ginger tea when I wasn’t feeling well.  

My room was always super clean and tidy, I really highly recommend this hotel not only because of the perfect location but the team really make a big effort to make every client happy while they are there.
Thank you to all the ritz team members, they are all the reason why I keep choosing this hotel. Looking forward for my next stay again!
data.title: Best location and best hotel experience in Dubai
